mcct.configscreen.title: MC Client Tweaks Configuration
mcct.configscreen.selecttweak: Select a tweak in the list to configure it or get more information about it
mcct.swaphandinv_tweak.name: Swap hand key in inventory
mcct.inventory_tweak.name: Inventory additions
mcct.inventory_tweak.desc: Use the swap hand key in the survival inventory just like the hotbar keys, use the mouse wheel to turn pages in the recipe book
mcct.swaphandinv_tweak.desc: Lets you use the swap hand key in the survival inventory, just like the hotbar keys.
mcct.sounddevice_tweak.name: Sound output device
mcct.sounddevice_tweak.desc: Lets you change the audio device in the Music & Sound menu. You should use the Music & Sound menu to easily set the device's name.
mcct.configvalues.preferred_device: Exact name of the audio device to use (blank for default)
mcct.lava_tweak.name: Lava fog
mcct.lava_tweak.desc: The vanilla lava fog is so dense you can't see anything. The vanilla density value is 2.0, and a value of 0 means no fog at all.
